CustomField.description:
SE: please change the url of this field to match your community domain name. Replace <yourcommunitydomain> with your actual community domain in both occurrences. The formula should look something like:
if(text($User.UserType) = 'Guest', HYPERLINK("https://sdodemo-main-166ce2cf6b6-172-17bdfda91fe.force.com/professional/s/guestrescheduling?anum=" & AppointmentNumber , "Appointment Link"), HYPERLINK("https://sdodemo-main-166ce2cf6b6-172-17bdfda91fe.force.com/professional/s/serviceappointment/" & Id , "Appointment Link"))
CustomField.label: AppointmentUrlFormula
